pick.heading: Chef’s Pick
pick.description: Belgian waffles topped with fresh banana slices, caramel sauce and powdered sugar.

items.description: A stack of four fluffy pancakes filled with blueberries, topped with warm blueberry compote and whipped cream.

items.dish: Two Eggs Any Style W/Housemade Sausage
items.description: Choice of Pork-Lime Sausage or Chicken-Curry Sausage or Turkey Sausage.
Fresh spinach, mushrooms, onions and Swiss cheese, rolled into fluffy omelette and topped with hollandaise and fresh diced tomatoes.

pick.heading: Chef’s Pick
pick.description: Roasted Pumpkin and aromatic vegetables blended to a silky puree, with a touch of cream and a dash of cinnamon, nutmeg and allspice.
